java/liquibase/database/template/StatementCreatorUtils.java

00001 package liquibase.database.template;
00002 
00003 import java.io.StringWriter;
00004 import java.math.BigDecimal;
00005 import java.sql.PreparedStatement;
00006 import java.sql.SQLException;
00007 import java.sql.Types;
00008 import java.util.Calendar;
00009 
00022 abstract class StatementCreatorUtils {
00023 
00034     public static void setParameterValue(
00035             PreparedStatement ps, int paramIndex, SqlParameter param, Object inValue)
00036             throws SQLException {
00037 
00038         setParameterValueInternal(ps, paramIndex, param.getSqlType(), param.getTypeName(), param.getScale(), inValue);
00039     }
00040 
00051     public static void setParameterValue(
00052             PreparedStatement ps, int paramIndex, int sqlType, Object inValue)
00053             throws SQLException {
00054 
00055         setParameterValueInternal(ps, paramIndex, sqlType, null, null, inValue);
00056     }
00057 
00072     private static void setParameterValueInternal(
00073             PreparedStatement ps, int paramIndex, int sqlType, String typeName, Integer scale, Object inValue)
00074             throws SQLException {
00075 
00076         if (inValue == null) {
00077             if (sqlType == SqlTypeValue.TYPE_UNKNOWN) {
00078                 boolean useSetObject = false;
00079                 try {
00080                     useSetObject = (ps.getConnection().getMetaData().getDatabaseProductName().indexOf("Informix") != -1);
00081                 }
00082                 catch (Throwable ex) {
00083 //                    logger.debug("Could not check database product name", ex);
00084                 }
00085                 if (useSetObject) {
00086                     ps.setObject(paramIndex, null);
00087                 } else {
00088                     ps.setNull(paramIndex, Types.NULL);
00089                 }
00090             } else if (typeName != null) {
00091                 ps.setNull(paramIndex, sqlType, typeName);
00092             } else {
00093                 ps.setNull(paramIndex, sqlType);
00094             }
00095         } else {  // inValue != null
00096             if (inValue instanceof SqlTypeValue) {
00097                 ((SqlTypeValue) inValue).setTypeValue(ps, paramIndex, sqlType, typeName);
00098             } else if (sqlType == Types.VARCHAR) {
00099                 ps.setString(paramIndex, inValue.toString());
00100             } else if (sqlType == Types.DECIMAL || sqlType == Types.NUMERIC) {
00101                 if (inValue instanceof BigDecimal) {
00102                     ps.setBigDecimal(paramIndex, (BigDecimal) inValue);
00103                 } else if (scale != null) {
00104                     ps.setObject(paramIndex, inValue, sqlType, scale);
00105                 } else {
00106                     ps.setObject(paramIndex, inValue, sqlType);
00107                 }
00108             } else if (sqlType == Types.DATE) {
00109                 if (inValue instanceof java.util.Date) {
00110                     if (inValue instanceof java.sql.Date) {
00111                         ps.setDate(paramIndex, (java.sql.Date) inValue);
00112                     } else {
00113                         ps.setDate(paramIndex, new java.sql.Date(((java.util.Date) inValue).getTime()));
00114                     }
00115                 } else if (inValue instanceof Calendar) {
00116                     Calendar cal = (Calendar) inValue;
00117                     ps.setDate(paramIndex, new java.sql.Date(cal.getTime().getTime()), cal);
00118                 } else {
00119                     ps.setObject(paramIndex, inValue, Types.DATE);
00120                 }
00121             } else if (sqlType == Types.TIME) {
00122                 if (inValue instanceof java.util.Date) {
00123                     if (inValue instanceof java.sql.Time) {
00124                         ps.setTime(paramIndex, (java.sql.Time) inValue);
00125                     } else {
00126                         ps.setTime(paramIndex, new java.sql.Time(((java.util.Date) inValue).getTime()));
00127                     }
00128                 } else if (inValue instanceof Calendar) {
00129                     Calendar cal = (Calendar) inValue;
00130                     ps.setTime(paramIndex, new java.sql.Time(cal.getTime().getTime()), cal);
00131                 } else {
00132                     ps.setObject(paramIndex, inValue, Types.TIME);
00133                 }
00134             } else if (sqlType == Types.TIMESTAMP) {
00135                 if (inValue instanceof java.util.Date) {
00136                     if (inValue instanceof java.sql.Timestamp) {
00137                         ps.setTimestamp(paramIndex, (java.sql.Timestamp) inValue);
00138                     } else {
00139                         ps.setTimestamp(paramIndex, new java.sql.Timestamp(((java.util.Date) inValue).getTime()));
00140                     }
00141                 } else if (inValue instanceof Calendar) {
00142                     Calendar cal = (Calendar) inValue;
00143                     ps.setTimestamp(paramIndex, new java.sql.Timestamp(cal.getTime().getTime()), cal);
00144                 } else {
00145                     ps.setObject(paramIndex, inValue, Types.TIMESTAMP);
00146                 }
00147             } else if (sqlType == SqlTypeValue.TYPE_UNKNOWN) {
00148                 if (isStringValue(inValue)) {
00149                     ps.setString(paramIndex, inValue.toString());
00150                 } else if (isDateValue(inValue)) {
00151                     ps.setTimestamp(paramIndex, new java.sql.Timestamp(((java.util.Date) inValue).getTime()));
00152                 } else if (inValue instanceof Calendar) {
00153                     Calendar cal = (Calendar) inValue;
00154                     ps.setTimestamp(paramIndex, new java.sql.Timestamp(cal.getTime().getTime()));
00155                 } else {
00156                     // Fall back to generic setObject call without SQL type specified.
00157                     ps.setObject(paramIndex, inValue);
00158                 }
00159             } else {
00160                 // Fall back to generic setObject call with SQL type specified.
00161                 ps.setObject(paramIndex, inValue, sqlType);
00162             }
00163         }
00164     }
00165 
00169     private static boolean isStringValue(Object inValue) {
00170         return (inValue instanceof CharSequence || inValue instanceof StringWriter);
00171     }
00172 
00177     private static boolean isDateValue(Object inValue) {
00178         return (inValue instanceof java.util.Date && !(inValue instanceof java.sql.Date ||
00179                 inValue instanceof java.sql.Time || inValue instanceof java.sql.Timestamp));
00180     }
00181 
00182 }
